verses.content: Judahai lai chun Pathien chu hrietin a um a, Israelhai lai chun a hming a ropui a nih.
Salema chun a bâwktê chu a um a, Chun, ama umna chu Zionah a um a,
Chutaka chun thalngul thalhai chu a suksiet a, Phaw dâm, kâwlhnâm dâm, indona dâm leh.
Nang chu ropuitak le ṭhatak i na, sase tlânga inthawk chun
Pasalṭhahai chu rawkin an um a, An in chu an in sawng tah a; Mi hrât khawm tukhawmin an kut an inlet thei ta nawh.
Aw Jakob Pathien, i kâwkna leiin, Tawlailîr le sakawr khawm ininnghiltir dêrin an um ve veh a;
Nang, nangma ngei chu ṭi ding i nih, I lunginsen taphawt chun tu am i mithmuah ngîr thei an ta?
I rorêl thu chu vâna inthawkin în hriettir a, Hnuoi hin a ṭih a, a to tah a.
Hnuoia mi thuhnuoirawlhai po po sandam dinga, Pathien chu rorêl dinga a tho lai khan.
Matheiloin mihriem lunginsenna hin la hung inpâk ngei a ti che, Lunginsenna mahla chun inkhit i tih.
Thu tiem unla, LALPA in Pathien kuoma chun hlen ro, A vêla mi po po chun ṭidingpa chu lâwmmanhai hung chawipêk raw hai se.
Ama chun rorêltuhai huoina chu sât bawng a ta, Ama chu hnuoia lalhai ta ding chun ṭi a um a nih.
